Space Coast Area Transit
is the name of the local Brevard County bus service . It is a cheap way to get around and is handicap accessible . The website provides maps and timetables . Buses travel to most sites and places of interest . $ 1.25 per ride , or $ 35 for a monthly pass .

Boardwalk Burrito
Located among the eateries at the end of US 192 , beside Starbucks and Coldstone Creamery . Made to order Burritos , Nachos , Fajitas , etc similar in style to the Moe 's franchise . Specials : Tuesday after 4PM-2 for 1 price tacos($ 3.50 , the Mahi Mahi tacos are best ) and Friday after 4PM are half price nachos ( you can get ultimate nachos and a drink for ~$ 6 )
Friendly Toast
( formerly known as " Friendly Toast " ) , 300 Ocean Ave , ☏ +1 321-733-5590 . Diner-style restaurant . Brilliant breakfasts . A favorite of locals . Great food at great prices . You can eat inside ( usually crowded ) or at a few tables outside .
